summary.span: 命名空间包含可用于在“服务器资源管理器”中扩展 SharePoint 节点的类型，或用于定义新型节点的类型。

span.span: The namespace contains types you can use to extend SharePoint nodes in **Server Explorer** or to define new types of nodes.

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在服务器资源管理器中扩展 SharePoint 连接节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md)。

span.span: For more information, see [Extending the SharePoint Connections Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然此命名空间中的类型的大部分都是接口，则只有以下接口旨在在你的代码中实现：Although most of the types in this namespace are interfaces, only the following interfaces are intended to be implemented in your code: - ： 实现此接口来扩展现有类型中的 SharePoint 节点**服务器资源管理器**。: Implement this interface to extend an existing type of SharePoint node in **Server Explorer**. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md)。For more information, see [How to: Extend a SharePoint Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md). - ： 实现此接口可定义新类型中的 SharePoint 节点**服务器资源管理器**。: Implement this interface to define a new type of SharePoint node in **Server Explorer**. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 向服务器资源管理器中添加自定义 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add a Custom SharePoint Node to Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md).
